docs.lead_paragraph: There is a zombie survival guide and a zombie etiquette guide, a best-selling version of "Pride and Prejudice" with zombies (soon to be a major motion picture), a collection of "Zombie Haiku," at least two zombie-themed television series and, in time for the holidays, a book of zombie Christmas carols.
